entry.title: Monday: A few flurries. High minus 11.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. A few flurries beginning late this afternoon. Wind northwest 20 km/h. High minus 11. Wind chill minus 24 this morning and minus 19 this afternoon. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Monday 26 December 2022

entry.title: Monday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 16. POP 30%
entry.summary: A few flurries ending late this evening then cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Local amount 2 cm. Wind west 20 km/h becoming light near midnight. Low minus 16. Wind chill near minus 21. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Monday 26 December 2022

entry.title: Tuesday: Periods of snow. High minus 3.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Periods of snow beginning early in the afternoon. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind becoming south 20 km/h gusting to 40 early in the afternoon. High minus 3. Wind chill minus 20 in the morning and minus 9 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Monday 26 December 2022
